attributes.action: immrdiately revoke ICTS UK Ltd's licence to operate at any UK airport in any capacity related to the security of aircraft or passengers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the Tonight programme's report on ICTS's methods and working practices at Birmingham International Airport, broadcast Monday 4th June 2007, it would be irresonsible of the government to allow ICTS UK Ltd to operate in any capacity related to aircraft or passenger security.  Their staff are at best poorly vetted and trained and at worst drug dealing incompetents with a total disregard for aviation security.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
